title: [1508521049] Save or Spend? Cycling Upgrade Hacks | Maintenance Monday
description:
Should you splash the cash or can you save? Upgrading your bike doesn't always have to put you out of pocket, so Si shows you how to get the most bang for your buck when it comes to upgrading your road bike. 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/lw
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/lv

Which cycling upgrades represent the best value? Ex pro rider Simon Richardson asks, should you spend or save?

asset.title: Save or Spend? Cycling Upgrade Hacks | Maintenance Monday
asset.description:
Should you splash the cash or can you save? Upgrading your bike doesn't always have to put you out of pocket, so Si shows you how to get the most bang for your buck when it comes to upgrading your road bike. 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/lw
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/lv

Which cycling upgrades represent the best value? Ex pro rider Simon Richardson asks, should you spend or save? 💵 

- Groupset upgrades - is it worth it?
- Will a tyre upgrade deserve your cash?
- Does Si's gear cable verdict surprise you?
- Do bars give you bang for buck?
- So what about tubes?
- Can you save on your clipless pedals?
- So what about Powermeters?

Let us know what you think the best upgrades you can make in the comments 👇

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/lu

Watch more on GCN...
Make your bike look more pro 📹  http://gcn.eu/29rJk1U
Make your bike faster! 📹  http://gcn.eu/2aegAtx

Photos: © Bettiniphoto / http://www.bettiniphoto.net/ & ©Tim De Waele / http://www.tdwsport.com

Music: Springtime Feeling - Arthur Pochon

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
